name: Roommates (itch)
description:
-- Submission for Community Game Jam -- Pitch

Before he leaves, Harry wants to organize a final evening with his roommate Sebastian.

Intention

The idea comes from a reflection that Harry had about the flow of an evening party: when we arrived at the end, we imagine all the other branching possibilities that could have been in recent hours.
Also, to get closer to the theme "The game is a Liar", we want to show by the gameplay of choices (lie or tell the truth), that we do not need to pretend to be someone else to have a good time and to be well seen.
We thought to make video clips of situations quite ordinary, to show to the player who are the characters in their daily life.

Controls

Use the mouse to click on the buttons when they appear.

Press ESC to leave the game.
